backpack.description: Felix is getting too heavy for the Baby Bjorn, so we got a backpack carrier.  Felix loves it, and apparently finds it comfy:  in this picture, he's still asleep in it, post-hike.
backpack.title: Backpack

firstmeal1.description: Mom lovingly feeds Felix his very first food: rice cereal mush.
firstmeal1.title: Firstmeal 1

firstmeal2.description: Dad takes turn holding the spoon.
firstmeal2.title: Firstmeal 2

firstmeal3.description: Felix quickly gets the idea and takes over the spoon.
firstmeal3.title: Firstmeal 3

firstmeal4.description: Rice cereal is an intant hit! Felix frantically grabs at the plate for more food.
firstmeal4.title: Firstmeal 4

firstmeal5.description: Failing to pick up the plate (specially designed to be hard to lift), Felix starts chewing on the high chair tray.  Mooooore food!   Mooooore!
firstmeal5.title: Firstmeal 5

firstmeal6.description: Second day of solid food. Felix gets one meal a day, in addition to his regular 6 bottles.
firstmeal6.title: Firstmeal 6

firstmeal7.description: Now we have to wash the dishes AND the baby.
firstmeal7.title: Firstmeal 7

lift1.description: This is one of Felix's play stations.
lift1.title: Lift 1

lift2.description: Felix grabs the top and lifts himself mightily.  Sometimes his butt even comes off the floor.
lift2.title: Lift 2

lift3.description: In search of literature, or a new handhold?
lift3.title: Lift 3

description:
Felix turned 0.5 years old this week. On his birthday checkup, he was 27 3/4 inches (70 centimeters) and 19 lbs 8 oz (8.840 kg).

Felix is getting a tooth. It broke the gum, but it is not entirely out yet. Except for some lower lip sucking, Felix does not seem bothered by teething, to our great relief.

The tooth came just in time for his first solid meal. Felix looooooooves his rice cereal mush.

See this week's video.
title: June 17
